query:
SELECT 
  'research_publications' as table_name, 
  COUNT(*) as total_records,
  MIN(publicationYear) as earliest_year,
  MAX(publicationYear) as latest_year
FROM research_publications
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'glossary_terms' as table_name, 
  COUNT(*) as total_records,
  NULL as earliest_year,
  NULL as latest_year
FROM glossary_terms
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'economic_indicators' as table_name, 
  COUNT(*) as total_records,
  MIN(YEAR(date)) as earliest_year,
  MAX(YEAR(date)) as latest_year
FROM economic_indicators
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'data_sources' as table_name, 
  COUNT(*) as total_records,
  NULL as earliest_year,
  NULL as latest_year
FROM data_sources;
